name: Paladin Gunny
descriptions: Paladin Gunny is a Brotherhood of Steel paladin stationed at the Citadel in 2277, and is tasked as the drill instructor for new initiates.
Paladin Gunny was involved in Elder Lyons' original expedition to the Capital Wasteland.
He is responsible for training all initiates in the use of power armor.
He can be found in the A ring just outside the lab in the council room, outside in the courtyard training recruits during the daytime, or inside a dormitory in B ring.
"Gunny" is a play on the common nickname for the United States Marine Corps personnel holding the rank of Gunnery Sergeant.

topics.response_text: I am charged with the duty of turning these maggots into Brothers of Steel.

topics.topic_text: So... Any thoughts on the Enclave?
topics.response_text: We're going to kick their asses, plain and simple. And once we do...

topics.topic_text: Can you train me to use Power Armor?
topics.response_text: Heard you were coming. Yeah, I can train you. But don’t ask me to like it. My Initiates sweat blood, and you just get a free pass?

topics.topic_text: Can someone in the Citadel train me to wear Power Armor?
topics.response_text: That would be me. But that ain’t gonna happen. Not unless Elder Lyons himself gives you the all clear.
...okay. You got all that? I think you know enough now to at least move around in Power Armor without killing yourself. That’s something, right?

topics.topic_text: So... Any thoughts on the Enclave?
topics.response_text: Killing unarmed civilians... Makes me sick. Come over here, try fighting someone who shoots back. Fucking cowards.

topics.topic_text: Care to share anything about the Super Mutants?
topics.response_text: Why you think I ride these Initiates so hard? I make training hell so fighting those Uglies won't be.

conversation.response_text: Soldier, don't you dare start running that mouth until you can put one of those grenades through a fourth story window at 200 yards.
You're damn right you will. And you'll keep at it until you learn to keep that mouth shut. We've got no room for braggarts here.
Are you kidding me? It's not the weapon, Initiate! Try holding the gun properly instead of firing from the hip like some goddamned cowboy.
Try loosening your grip, maggot. Hold the weapon higher  see nothing but the sight and the target. Try not to screw it up this time.
Then you've reached a new level of understanding. Combat does not take place in the brain. It is passion, instinct, and the will to survive.
So it was taught to me, so will you teach it some day. Enough jaw, maggot. Back to work.
Now look, to wear Power Armor, first thing you need to do is relax your muscles. Let the suit do the work. Okay? Now, you...
If you'll excuse me, I need to go show these fish how to shoot straight.{Grumbling under his breath at the incompetency of his students.}
I'll train these marshmallows if it kills me...{Grumbling under his breath at the incompetency of his students.}
